meanings.definition: A type of Australian acacia tree.
meanings.sent1: The mulga tree provides shade in the hot Australian desert.
meanings.sent2: The mulga tree's leaves are small and help it conserve water.
meanings.sent3: Why did the koala bring a book to the mulga tree? To read in the cool shade!
meanings.sent4: The mulga tree stood tall like a guardian in the vast desert landscape.
meanings.sent5: The golden sunlight filtered through the mulga tree's branches, creating a magical glow.

meanings.definition: The wood of the mulga tree.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman carved a beautiful bowl from mulga wood.
meanings.sent2: The furniture in the cabin was made of sturdy mulga wood.
meanings.sent3: Why did the termite refuse to eat the mulga wood? It was too tough to chew!
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed in the empty room, bouncing off the polished mulga wood floor.
meanings.sent5: The rich aroma of mulga wood filled the workshop, reminding him of the Australian outback.

meanings.definition: A region in Australia where mulga trees are common.
meanings.sent1: The vast mulga region is home to diverse wildlife.
meanings.sent2: Travelers marveled at the beauty of the expansive mulga landscape.
meanings.sent3: Why did the kangaroo hop all the way to the mulga region? To enjoy the scenic views!
meanings.sent4: The mulga region stretched out like a green carpet under the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The tranquil beauty of the mulga region captured the artist's imagination.
